==Compatibility==
==Compatibility==
â
The majority of applications can run on most computers with [[Windows 2000]] or later<ref>{{cite web |url=http://portableapps.com/apps/compatibility |title=PortableApps.com OS Compatibility List |publisher= PortableApps.com |accessdate=2007-10-20 }}</ref> Most apps will also run under Wine on Linux-based operating systems. Older versions of many apps support Windows 95/98/Me, but no new releases support these systems.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://portableapps.com/news/2010-04-27_-_ending_windows_95-98-me_support |title=Ending Windows 95/98/Me Support |publisher=PortableApps.com |accessdate=2010-04-29 }}</ref>
+
The majority of applications can run on most computers with [[Windows 2000]] or later<ref>{{cite web |url=http://portableapps.com/apps/compatibility |title=PortableApps.com OS Compatibility List |publisher= PortableApps.com |accessdate=2007-10-20 }}</ref> Most apps will also run under [[Wine]] on [[Linux]]-based operating systems. Older versions of many apps support Windows 95/98/Me, but no new releases support these systems.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://portableapps.com/news/2010-04-27_-_ending_windows_95-98-me_support |title=Ending Windows 95/98/Me Support |publisher=PortableApps.com |accessdate=2010-04-29 }}</ref>
